org.lcsim.geometry.subdetector

Class HPSEcal3

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.geometry.compact.Subdetector
      • org.lcsim.geometry.subdetector.HPSEcal3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HepRepProvider, Subdetector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HPSEcal4

    public class HPSEcal3
extends Subdetector
    Reconstruction version of HPS ECal with crystal array.

      • getNeighbors

        Set<Long> getNeighbors(Long id)
        Get the neighbors for a given cell ID. Each crystal not on an edge has 8 neighbors. Edge crystals have fewer.
        Parameters:
        id - The cell ID.
        Returns:
        A Set containing the cell's neighbors.
